Author: codeLove
Content: "Google buys a start-up once every few days, or around one a week"

Author: drifkin
Content: Viral strategies have been pretty intriguing lately, especially what Trent Reznor did with his latest CD.  I see viral marketing becoming a lot more prevalent in the near future though, which will dilute its effect quite a bit.  I think I'll be pretty sick of viral marketing soon, as large corporations turn it into another standard marketing technique.

Author: staunch
Content: I'm pretty sure Google uses the same veto method with ~3 people. I don't think it's a good idea. Some of the best people I've known seemed strange, and even stupid, when I first met them. More than a small group of people with veto power seems likely to filter out many of the greats.\n

Author: vlad
Content: Let's test out viral strategies to see if they really work!  Simply ask 10 people to vote this up!  You have to register on this site first.
